name: Sharks VS Robots
description:
Sharks VS Robots is a remake of Manic Miner, a classic retro game released in 1983.

The game was developed by a team of 4 programmers and 4 artists, Masters students in Gamer Camp, Birmingham City University.

Programmers:

Bib Boutrif
https://aboutrif.wixsite.com/portfolio
Dave O'Dwyer
https://uk.linkedin.com/in/dave-o-dwyer-42388a1b0
Henrique Teixeira
https://www.henrique.games/
Umeer Ramahttps://umeerrama.wordpress.com/
